name: error: SLASHER ALERT
description:
"error: SLASHER ALERT" is a minimalist, black and white, horror interactive fiction game.

You are a photographer and your boss doesn't care if the park isn't safe anymore. You've got a job to do, pictures to take.

You don't notice anything out of the ordinary until you get home and take a look at the photos. Something followed you from the park and it wants to play a game with you.

Explore the desktop, find out what's happening with your computer.

- - -

This is PART 1 of "error: SLASHER ALERT".

PART 2 is coming soon with more things to explore, play and survive!

- - -

Made with RPG Maker Mv and MS paint for the Scream Zone Jam 9.

- - -

Links: Kofi - Twitter - Devlog
